Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Garfield/Damen
ShortDescription: EB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, 59th, Ashland and Garfield due to, street blockage near Garfield/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted viaGarfield, 59th, Ashland and Garfield due to, street blockage near Garfield/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Roscoe
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison and Broadway due to, street blockage near Broadway/Roscoe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison and Broadway due to, street blockage near Broadway/Roscoe.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
